summary: A botanist woos the secretary of an industrialist whose company threatens the local water supply.
cast: Ineko Arima|Keiji Sada|Yôko Katsuragi|Toshiko Kobayashi|Shin Saburi|Shizue Natsukawa|Hiroko Nakagawa|Kazuko Yamamoto|Daisuke Katô|Ryôhei Uchida|Tatsuya Ishiguro|Tsutomu Shimomoto|Toshiaki Konoe|Toranosuke Ogawa|Ushio Akashi|Sue Mitobe|Satoshi Ômiya|Kôji Kiyomura|Kô Nishimura|Nobutaka Ôkôchi|Fumio Watanabe|Zenichi Inagawa|Chisato Kasuga|Imako Minakami|Yôichi Ohsugi|Jô Mitsumura|Tazuko Kusaka|Toshiko Tashiro|Kimio Kishimoto|Keiji Tsuchida
title: Izumi
